price: ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߦߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߕߍ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߕߟߋ߬ߓߐ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā warabbu al-mashāriqi
